token_not_found.description: Displayed when the token is missing.

welcome_policy_text.description: Message informing the user about the terms and privacy policy.

welcome_continue_button.description: Text for the 'Continue' button on the welcome screen.

dashboard_search_box_placeholder.description: Placeholder text for the search box on the dashboard.

channels_loading_text.description: A message is displayed until the channels are listed.

logout_button_text.description: Text for the 'Logout' button on the dashboard.

logout_modal_text.message: Eklentiden tamamen çıkış yapmak istediğinize emin misiniz, Tüm bilgileriniz silenecektir?

deletion_modal_delete_button.description: Text for the 'Delete' button in the deletion modal.

deletion_progression_completed_text.description: Message displayed when the deletion process is complete.

deletion_progression_text.description: Message displayed while the deletion process is ongoing.

no_channel_found.description: Displayed when no channels are found during a search.
